products.title: Bella Blackout Rosewood Pink Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Bella blackout rosewood pink roller blind in pink. Made to measure from 9.85 with free uk mainland delivery. This roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their best-selling bella blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home.
This soft rosewood pink roller blind brightens any room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure roller blind a perfect addition to any room that needs optimum light control. The soft dusty rosewood pink fabric will work beautifully with natural wooden tones throughout the home. Their rollers are great for privacy and light control.
At swift direct blinds, we take quality seriously. Not only are we situated in the heart of the yorkshire textile industry, but their own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country.This pink roller blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by their blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service.
 
 Product id: sdb-rbx2064 fabric colour: rosewood pink material: 100% polyester lining: colour match backing - see sample headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix   control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes

products.title: Bella Blackout Rosewood Pink Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Bella blackout rosewood pink electric roller blind in pink. Made to measure from 140.59 with free uk mainland delivery. This electric roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their best-selling bella blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style both inside and outside your home. 
 
 This rosewood pink electric roller blind brightens any room and is also made from blackout fabric, making this quality made to measure electirc roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control. The dusty rosewood pink of the fabric will look stunning when paired with natural wooden tones and cool modern grey shades will benefit from a splash of colour with this fabric. Their electric rollers are inherently child safe as they require no cords to operate & electric roller blinds are perfect for more dificult to reach windows as they can be operated with a remote control. They also introduce an exceptionally modern feel within the space. 
 
 At swift direct blinds, we take quality seriously. Not only are we situated in the heart of the yorkshire textile industry, but their own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country. This purple roller blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by their blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service.
